name: Covfefe Night Typo!
description:
Hello,

This game is a submission for Weekly Hour Game Jam. The theme is covfefe. This game is still incomplete, because I only have 1 hour to make it.

After the game jam over, I'm planning on adding:

  • An introduction room (title and some picture art)
  • Some sound effect and background music(I know it is too quiet)
  • Some entertaining ending (yeah, the ending is kinda boring)
  • Maybe, I'll submit it to 2 color jam. Let's see.. :D

Hoping, I can update this game next week :D
